document_title: Foreskin inflammation: Causes, signs and prevention
subsection_content: Balanitis is not a sexually transmitted disease (STD), nor is it a sexually transmitted infection (STI). Therefore, when men get sick, they do not need to worry too much. However, you should take proper home care measures to improve this condition. (4)
subsection_title: viem bao quy dau.json. Is balanitis contagious?
subsection_data:
viem bao quy dau.json. Is balanitis contagious?
Balanitis is not a sexually transmitted disease (STD), nor is it a sexually transmitted infection (STI). Therefore, when men get sick, they do not need to worry too much. However, you should take proper home care measures to improve this condition. (4)
